column1: L, Stephen Miller Is Suing Joe Biden On Behalf Of White People, David, 2021-05-02,
column2: Former White House adviser Stephen Miller said on Sunday that he is suing the Biden administration to prevent Black people from having an unfair advantage over other races.
column3: While speaking to Fox News host Maria Bartiromo Miller argued that a COVID-19 relief law is unfair to white people because it allocated $5 billion to Black farmers who were denied federal aid due to discrimination.
column4: According to Miller white farmers -- who have traditionally gotten the bulk of federal aid -- should be able to receive the money that is set aside for Black farmers.
column5: We filed two lawsuits Miller told Bartiromo. "One lawsuit to ensure that farm aid is delivered irrespective of one's race and ethnicity."
column6: The Biden administration has specifically excluded people solely based on skin color he added. "That's outrageous."
column7: Miller went on to describe a second lawsuit that he hopes will force the Biden administration to take harsh actions against migrants and undocumented immigrants.
column8: Imagine you were living in an apartment building and a new landlord came in and he ripped off all the doors he ripped out all the windows and he said that any lawbreaker any trespasser any vandal anyone -- even criminal -- who wants to come into your building and your unit is free to do so Miller opined.
